name: REALITY
description: REALITY is a FREE short First-Person horror game, it uses a graphical style to represent the present mood of the game. It gives the player the ability to choose and get slightly different results. The game has many mysteries you might want to uncover.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 MB RAM Storage: 357 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 16 MB RAM Storage: 357 MB available space
